DOC.detailed_description: `` Vaginal dryness '' define dryness , itching , burn pain unrelated sexual intercourse .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman subjective symptom `` vulvovaginal dryness '' sum score ( 016 ) parameter dryness , itch , burn pain unrelated sexual intercourse least 3 AND VAS value `` Overall impairment daily life due condition `` vulvovaginal dryness '' > 0 Visit 1 . Last menstruation 12 month Visit 1 OR bilateral oophorectomy without hysterectomy 3 month Visit 1 . Physical mental healthy woman assess medical history . PAP test perform within last 12 month Visit 1 result less PAP III . Signed write informed consent participation Trial . Willingness actively participate trial come schedule visit . Any indication medical history regard impairment hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , pulmonary , endocrinological hematological system ( especially venous arterial thromboembolism , ischemic stroke , myocardial infarction , porphyria ) clinically relevant clinical trial ( cf . contraindication warning Estriol cream 0.1 % ) . Known thrombophilic disorder ( e.g . protein C , protein S antithrombin deficiency ) . Breast cancer ( acute / medical history suspect ) . Estrogendependent tumor ( acute / medical history suspect , especially ovarian / endometrial carcinoma ) . Systemic hormonal replacement therapy ( tablet , patch , injection , dermal product ) , phytohormonal therapy use SERMs ( inter alia antiestrogens ) within 3 month Visit 1 / conduct trial .
